# promptText

**Instance Property**

A prompt that displays any additional required information.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var promptText: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The prompt text is displayed immediately below the title text.

## Configuring the Digit Entry View

- **numberOfDigits**: The number of required digits.
- **titleText**: The title of the digit entry view.
- **isSecureDigitEntry**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an entered digit is immediately obscured.
